entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Montréal
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Trudeau Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: WNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle mixed with light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
